faq.title: Get answers to common questions about IA Sofia
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI assistant

q1.question: How does IA Sofia connect to my WhatsApp?
q1.answer: IA Sofia connects through WhatsApp Business API. After subscribing, you'll receive step-by-step instructions to link your business number. The setup takes less than 10 minutes and our support team is available 24/7 to help you through the process.

q2.question: Will my clients know they're talking to an AI?
q2.answer: IA Sofia is designed to communicate naturally and professionally. While we recommend transparency about using AI assistance, many clients appreciate the instant responses. You can customize how Sofia introduces herself to match your preferences.

q3.question: Can IA Sofia handle complex booking requests?
q3.answer: Yes! IA Sofia can handle various booking scenarios including checking availability, scheduling appointments, rescheduling, and managing cancellations. For very complex requests, Sofia can seamlessly transfer the conversation to you.

q4.question: What if IA Sofia doesn't know how to respond?
q4.answer: IA Sofia is trained on beauty industry scenarios, but if she encounters something unfamiliar, she'll politely indicate she needs to connect the client with you directly. You'll receive a notification to take over the conversation.

q5.question: How secure is my client data?
q5.answer: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted and stored securely. We're GDPR compliant and never share your client information with third parties. Your data belongs to you and you can export or delete it at any time.

q6.question: Can I customize IA Sofia's responses?
q6.answer: Absolutely! You can customize Sofia's personality, tone, and specific responses to match your brand voice. You can also add custom services, pricing, and availability information that Sofia will use to respond to clients.
